::FZ/Zardus::

FZ falls forward from all the shots hitting him from behind and drops 
his gun. Taking the opportunity, Zardus crouches, pulls out his own 
gun, and fires off several shots at the traitor's chest. FZ stumbles 
back, right into Nemesis' and Zergling's swords. He slides off the 
swords and falls to the ground, his eyes going blank.

Zardus looks down at the still form of FZ. "Thank you, Nemesis, 
Zergling." He says.

"Take his weapons and put him in a CR chamber. Inform me when he 
wakes up. The fool will be very sorry before he dies......" Zardus 
tells Nemesis.

He looks over at Wolfgang. "Zergling, inform me if Wolfgang ever 
decides to speak. I'll go see the new bot."

Zardus walks off down a hallway, heading for the entrance of the 
alliance base. He raises his comm-link to his mouth, "I'm on my way, 
Dracona."
